name: Voxel Fight (Voxel Fight)
description:
Welcome to the official Voxel Fight itch.io page!

The builds, images, and videos (and all media) are currently a work in progress and do not represent the final game. 

With that said, feel free to play and let us know what you think! Follow us on our various social media outlets and get into the fight. 

www.voxelfight.com

Voxel Fight Controls:

Keyboard: WASD Movement. SPACEBAR jumps. F key attack 1. G key attack 2. The "START" button is the RETURN or ENTER button.

Xbox One: LEFT JOYSTICK movement. A button jumps. X button attack 1. Y button attack 2. The "START" button is the HAMBURGER (three horizontal lines).

PS4: LEFT JOYSTICK movement. X button jumps. SQUARE button attack 1. Triangle button attack 2. The "START" button  is the OPTIONS button.

The "ESC" key returns to the main menu at any time, and hitting the "ESC" key while at the main menu QUITS the game.
